00033     // A * x
00042     template<class SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>
00043     vector_expression<const compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00044                       const vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>, 
00045                       op_prod > prod_impl(const compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & mat, 
00046                                      const vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & vec, 
00047                                      unsigned int NUM_THREADS)
00048     {
00049       return vector_expression<const compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00050                                const vector<SCALARTYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>, 
00051                                op_prod >(mat, vec);
00052     }
00053     
00063     template<class TYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VECTOR_ALIGNMENT>
00064     void prod_impl(const viennacl::compressed_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT> & mat, 
00065                    const viennacl::vector<TYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & vec,
00066                          viennacl::vector<TYPE, VECTOR_ALIGNMENT> & result, 
00067                    unsigned int NUM_THREADS = 0)
00068     {
00069       assert(mat.size1() == result.size());
00070       assert(mat.size2() == vec.size());
00071 
00072       unsigned int pos = 0;
00073       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, mat.handle1());
00074       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, mat.handle2());
00075       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, mat.handle());
00076       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, vec.handle());
00077       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, result.handle());
00078       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.setArgument(pos++, mat.size1());
00079       
00080       if (NUM_THREADS == 0)
00081         viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.start1D();
00082       else
00083         viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<TYPE, ALIGNMENT>::vec_mul.start1D(viennacl::ocl::device().work_groups() * NUM_THREADS, NUM_THREADS);
00084     }
00085 
00091     template<typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT>
00092     void inplace_solve(compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT> const & L, vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec, viennacl::linalg::unit_lower_tag)
00093     {
00094       unsigned int threads = viennacl::ocl::device().work_items_per_group();
00095       //unsigned int threads = 4;
00096       
00097       unsigned int pos = 0;
00098       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_forward.setArgument(pos++, L.handle1());
00099       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_forward.setArgument(pos++, L.handle2());
00100       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_forward.setArgument(pos++, L.handle());
00101       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_forward.setLocalBuffer(pos++, sizeof(int) * (threads+1));
00102       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_forward.setLocalBuffer(pos++, sizeof(SCALARTYPE) * threads);
00103       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_forward.setArgument(pos++, vec.handle());
00104       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_forward.setArgument(pos++, L.size1());
00105       
00106       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_forward.start1D(threads, threads);
00107     }
00108     
00115     template<typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT, typename TAG>
00116     vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> solve(compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT> const & L,
00117                                         const vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec,
00118                                         const viennacl::linalg::unit_lower_tag & tag)
00119     {
00120       // do an inplace solve on the result vector:
00121       vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> result(vec.size());
00122       result = vec;
00123 
00124       inplace_solve(L, result, tag);
00125     
00126       return result;
00127     }
00128     
00129     
00135     template<typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT>
00136     void inplace_solve(compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT> const & U, vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec, viennacl::linalg::upper_tag)
00137     {
00138       //unsigned int threads = viennacl::ocl::DEFAULT_THREADS;
00139       unsigned int threads = 32;
00140       //unsigned int threads = 1;
00141       
00142       unsigned int pos = 0;
00143       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_backward.setArgument(pos++, U.handle1());
00144       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_backward.setArgument(pos++, U.handle2());
00145       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_backward.setArgument(pos++, U.handle());
00146       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_backward.setLocalBuffer(pos++, sizeof(int) * (threads+2));
00147       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_backward.setLocalBuffer(pos++, sizeof(SCALARTYPE) * (threads+2));
00148       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_backward.setArgument(pos++, vec.handle());
00149       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_backward.setArgument(pos++, U.size1());
00150       
00151       viennacl::linalg::kernels::compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE,MAT_ALIGNMENT>::lu_backward.start1D(threads, threads);
00152     }
00153 
00160     template<typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT, unsigned int VEC_ALIGNMENT, typename TAG>
00161     vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> solve(compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT> const & L,
00162                                         const vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> & vec,
00163                                         viennacl::linalg::upper_tag const & tag)
00164     {
00165       // do an inplace solve on the result vector:
00166       vector<SCALARTYPE, VEC_ALIGNMENT> result(vec.size());
00167       result = vec;
00168     
00169       inplace_solve(L, result, tag);
00170     
00171       return result;
00172     }

00179     //v = A * x
00184     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00185     template <unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00186     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & 
00187     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator=(const viennacl::vector_expression< const compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00188                                                                                           const viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00189                                                                                           viennacl::op_prod> & proxy) 
00190     {
00191       // check for the special case x = A * x
00192       if (proxy.get_lhs().handle() == this->handle())
00193       {
00194         viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(proxy.get_rhs().size());
00195         viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00196         *this = result;
00197         return *this;
00198       }
00199       else
00200       {
00201         viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), *this);
00202         return *this;
00203       }
00204       return *this;
00205     }
00206 
00207     //v += A * x
00212     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00213     template <unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00214     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & 
00215     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator+=(const vector_expression< const compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00216                                                                                  const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00217                                                                                  op_prod> & proxy) 
00218     {
00219       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(proxy.get_lhs().size1());
00220       viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00221       *this += result;
00222       return *this;
00223     }
00224 
00229     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00230     template <unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00231     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> & 
00232     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator-=(const vector_expression< const compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00233                                                                                  const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00234                                                                                  op_prod> & proxy) 
00235     {
00236       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(proxy.get_lhs().size1());
00237       viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00238       *this -= result;
00239       return *this;
00240     }

00243     //free functions:
00248     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00249     template <unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00250     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> 
00251     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator+(const vector_expression< const compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00252                                                                                 const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00253                                                                                 op_prod> & proxy) 
00254     {
00255       assert(proxy.get_lhs().size1() == size());
00256       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(size());
00257       viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00258       result += *this;
00259       return result;
00260     }
00261 
00266     template <typename SCALARTYPE, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00267     template <unsigned int MAT_ALIGNMENT>
00268     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> 
00269     viennacl::vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>::operator-(const vector_expression< const compressed_matrix<SCALARTYPE, MAT_ALIGNMENT>,
00270                                                                                 const vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT>,
00271                                                                                 op_prod> & proxy) 
00272     {
00273       assert(proxy.get_lhs().size1() == size());
00274       vector<SCALARTYPE, ALIGNMENT> result(size());
00275       viennacl::linalg::prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), result);
00276       result = *this - result;
00277       return result;
00278     }
